turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there, what would you like to do today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order four pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: pizza from bella luna, got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size will your pizza be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: medium.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like four of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok 4 medium pizza, got it what are your choice of toppings.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was thinking pepperoni and sausage on the first one, chicken bacon and ranch on the second, pineapple and ham on the third.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A supreme pizza for the last one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok we have 1 pepperoni and sausage, 1 chicken with bacon and ranch, 1 pineapple and 1 supreme pizza is that right.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct. Also on all of those I would like gluten-free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok got it, let me repeat your order for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: we have 4 medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 pepperoni and sausage, 1 chicken with bacon and ranch, 1 pineapple and 1 supreme pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: all with gluten free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, let me get your totals for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: with 4 medium pizza your total comes to 76 dollars is that your final order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. your pizza are on order at the local Bella Luna pizzeria and will be ready for pickup in 30 min.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope. That'll be it. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: have a good day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
